typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		gkey as integer,
		uyv_gkey as integer,
		unit_id as string,
		decking_type as string,
		node_id as string,
		yard as boolean,
		from_pos_loctype as string,
		from_pos_locid as string,
		from_pos_loc_gkey as integer,
		from_pos_slot as string,
		from_pos_name as string,
		from_pos_bin as string,
		from_pos_tier as short,
		to_pos_loctype as string,
		to_pos_locid as string,
		to_pos_loc_gkey as boolean,
		to_pos_slot as string,
		to_pos_name as string,
		to_pos_bin as string,
		to_pos_tier as boolean,
		total_score as short,
		execution_time as short,
		phase as string,
		time_stamp as string
	),
	useSchema: false,
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	moveFiles: ['bronze/deckinghistory/load','bronze/deckinghistory/archive'],
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'kln',
	folderPath: 'bronze/deckinghistory/load',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true,
	dateFormats: ['dd-MM-yyyy'],
	timestampFormats: ['yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss.SSS\'Z\'','yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss\'Z\''],
	mode: 'read') ~> CSV
Aggregate1 derive(time_stamp = :timestamp,
		Year = year(:timestamp),
		Month = month(:timestamp),
		Week = weekOfYear(:timestamp),
		timestamp := coalesce(toTimestamp(split(time_stamp,".")[1],'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),toTimestamp(split(time_stamp,".")[1],'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm'),toTimestamp(split(time_stamp,".")[1],'dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm:ss'))) ~> DataTypeConversion
Select2 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			regexReplace($$,' ','_') = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(gkey),
	each(match(name!='gkey'), $$ = first($$))) ~> Aggregate1
CSV select(mapColumn(
		gkey,
		uyv_gkey,
		unit_id,
		time_stamp,
		decking_type,
		node_id,
		yard,
		from_pos_loctype,
		from_pos_locid,
		from_pos_loc_gkey,
		from_pos_slot,
		from_pos_name,
		from_pos_bin,
		from_pos_tier,
		to_pos_loctype,
		to_pos_locid,
		to_pos_loc_gkey,
		to_pos_slot,
		to_pos_name,
		to_pos_bin,
		to_pos_tier,
		total_score,
		execution_time,
		phase
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
filter1 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
DataTypeConversion filter(not(isNull(gkey)) && not(isNull(time_stamp))) ~> filter1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		gkey as integer,
		uyv_gkey as integer,
		unit_id as string,
		time_stamp as timestamp,
		decking_type as string,
		node_id as string,
		yard as boolean,
		from_pos_loctype as string,
		from_pos_locid as string,
		from_pos_loc_gkey as integer,
		from_pos_slot as string,
		from_pos_name as string,
		from_pos_bin as string,
		from_pos_tier as short,
		to_pos_loctype as string,
		to_pos_locid as string,
		to_pos_loc_gkey as boolean,
		to_pos_slot as string,
		to_pos_name as string,
		to_pos_bin as string,
		to_pos_tier as boolean,
		total_score as short,
		execution_time as short,
		details as string,
		phase as string,
		Year as integer,
		Month as integer,
		Week as integer
	),
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'kln',
	folderPath: 'silver/deckings',
	mergeSchema: true,
	autoCompact: true,
	optimizedWrite: true,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable: true,
	insertable: false,
	updateable: true,
	upsertable: true,
	keys:['gkey'],
	umask: 0777,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		Year,
		Month,
		Week
	)) ~> sink1
